name: Eiffel Tower Deluxe Tour
description: A comprehensive tour of the iconic Eiffel Tower, including a visit to the summit with a guide and a champagne toast.

name: Louvre Museum Private Tour
description: A guided tour of the world-famous Louvre Museum, including priority access to its masterpieces.

name: Seine River Cruise Relaxed
description: A relaxing evening cruise along the Seine River, offering stunning views of Paris's landmarks.

name: Zermatt Hiking Adventure
description: A guided hike in Zermatt, taking in the breathtaking views of the Matterhorn.

name: Interlaken Paragliding
description: An exhilarating paragliding experience over the stunning landscapes of Interlaken.

name: Grindelwald Skiing
description: A full day of skiing in Grindelwald, suitable for all skill levels.

name: Kuta Beach Surfing
description: A surfing lesson on the popular Kuta Beach, perfect for beginners and intermediate surfers.

name: Ubud Jungle Trekking
description: A guided trek through the lush jungles of Ubud, exploring hidden temples and waterfalls.

name: Gili Islands Snorkeling
description: A snorkeling trip to the crystal-clear waters of the Gili Islands, perfect for spotting marine life.

name: Dolphin swimming
description: Get to know the dolphins in their natural habitat and swim with them at Kuta Beach.

name: Beach Yoga at Sunset
description: Join a rejuvenating yoga session by the shore during sunset, guided by expert instructors.
safetyMeasures: Inform the instructor of any injuries

name: Ubud Rice Terrace Trekking
description: Explore the lush greenery and scenic beauty of Ubud's famous rice terraces on this guided trekking tour.

name: Traditional Balinese Cooking Class
description: Learn to prepare authentic Balinese dishes using fresh local ingredients in a traditional kitchen setting.
safetyMeasures: Handle knives and hot surfaces carefully

name: Nusa Dua Glass-Bottom Boat Tour
description: Enjoy a relaxing glass-bottom boat ride to explore the vibrant underwater world of Nusa Dua without getting wet.

name: Jet Ski Adventure in Nusa Dua
description: Feel the thrill of speed and adventure as you navigate the clear waters of Nusa Dua on a jet ski.

name: Sunset Surfing Lessons in Seminyak
description: Learn to surf in the iconic waves of Seminyak, with professional instructors guiding you every step of the way.

name: Balanise Cooking Class Seminyak
description: Immerse yourself in Balinese culture by learning to cook authentic dishes using fresh local ingredients.

name: Turtle Watching and Snorkeling Adventure
description: Snorkel alongside sea turtles in the crystal-clear waters of the Gili Islands, guided by local experts.

name: Glass Kayaking on Gili Meno Lagoon
description: Paddle through the serene waters of Gili Meno in a transparent kayak for a unique underwater view.

name: Sunset Tour at Tanah Lot Temple
description: Witness the breathtaking sunset at Tanah Lot Temple, one of Bali's iconic sea temples, perched on a rock formation.

name: Balinese Cultural Workshop at Tanah Lot
description: Immerse yourself in Balinese culture by participating in traditional art and craft workshops near Tanah Lot.

name: Jimbaran Bay Seafood Dinner
description: Enjoy a romantic seafood dinner by the beach at Jimbaran Bay, famous for its fresh seafood and stunning sunset views.
safetyMeasures: Stay within the designated dining area
Watch your step on the beach

name: Sunset Yoga at Jimbaran Beach
description: Relax and rejuvenate with a peaceful yoga session on the beach at sunset, guided by an experienced instructor.
safetyMeasures: Inform the instructor of any injuries
